author: Arnaldo Ramon

text: @Arc13 My bets are moreso towards Final Fantasy, Persona related(not typing all three things again), Pokemon, Donkey kong, Dragon Quest though I refuse to rule out the other possibilities. Onto my next step in trying to figure out #900. I've got 19 songs left to guess!
author: Arc13

text:
#900 nominee guesses are-
Final Fantasy, Shaodw Hearts, Secret Of, Mana, Seiken, Persona, Digital Devil Saga, Shin Megami, Pokemon, Breath Of Fire, Donkey Kong, Dragon Quest, Earthbound/Mother, Suikoden, Tales, and Xeno.
I know that sounds like a lot, but you actually look back at how many series Supra has covered, I really did wittle it down based upon popularity of the series, requests, how often you upload from the series and frankly, you've made it clear what games you particulary love.
author: Arc13

text:
this is a good track, but this can't beat the title screen song... now THAT is epic!

text: I hate living in the UK with our PAL 50hz conversions.  Means every game soundtrack I hear always sounds speeded up, though I'd assume the gameplay is easier on the PAL version (being slower). Awesome game anyways, one of my top 5.

text:
Alright! Bout time we saw some more Double Dragon action!
On a side note, 900 approaching. You said we'd have trouble guessing it way back when with Green Hill Zone so I plan to review your whole list, and comprise a few guesses as to series, followed by what theme from the series.
I already have my first idea of the song...it'll be something good. Tell me, am I right on that bit so far?

author: Rob Lowe

text: @scarletspeed7 The more you ask for it, the less I feel like actually uploading one. You have to understand that spamming really doesn't help your cause. Now because you did, if I were to upload a SC2 soon, I wouldn't want people to think that spamming requests is the way to go when it's not. I read all the suggestions, yours included the first time you asked for it, and I welcome them (on my channel or as a private message). Just don't spam them, thanks.
